DOC.brief_summary: HDQ 200 interventional multicenter study . This before-and-after design patient control . The main objective study determine percentage success procedure daily hemodialysis low dialysate flow . All patient treat conventional hemodialysis , least 3 month clinically stable , include study . Their 3 month data prior inclusion collect retrospectively . These 3 month conventional hemodialysis reference period . Patients treat daily hemodialysis low dialysate flow 3 month . During 3 month period , data period conventional hemodialysis collect prospectively .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Daily HemoDialysis Low Dialysate Flow Patients Previously Treated With Conventional Hemodialysis
